label: ProductBatch
comment: A group of products considered or dealt with together.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified assessment applicable to this referenced standard.
A fault applicable to this trade product.
A certification applicable to this product batch.
A product batch characteristic applicable to this product batch.
A certificate applicable to this product batch.
Packaging applicable for use with this product batch.
A specified agricultural application applied to this agricultural zone area.
A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
A treatment, expressed as text, applied to this crop produce batch.
A buyer assigned identifier of this product batch.
A material component of this trade product.
A trade product component of this product batch.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
The DNA marker identifier of this product batch.
A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
A manufacturer assigned identifier of this product batch.
A measure of the mass of this distinct chemical.
A mass measure of this distinct chemical expressed as a ratio to another mass, such as the total mass.
A measure of the maximum size of this product batch.
A measure of the minimum size of this product batch.
The product name, expressed as text, for this crop produce batch.
The code specifying the production mode for this product batch.
A seller assigned identifier of this product batch.
The measure of the size of this specified binary file.
An agricultural certificate specified for this crop plot.
An agricultural characteristic specified for this crop plot.
A sustainability assertion for this specified certification.
A referenced document for this specified inspection.
A referenced location specified for this material.
A note specified for this photographic picture.
A photographic picture specified for this product batch.
A production process specified for this product batch.
A certificate specified for this product batch.
A product batch characteristic specified for this product batch.
A supply chain event specified for this product batch.

referencedBy.comment: A product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
A product batch included in this supply chain inventory.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
A product batch related to this trade party.
A substitute product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
A substituted product batch applicable to this supply chain trade line item.
